metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12581 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in js/designer/move.js in phpMyAdmin before 4.8.2. A Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability has been found where an attacker can use a crafted database name to trigger an XSS attack when that database is referenced from the Designer feature. It was discovered phpmyadmin incorrectly handled database names. An attacker could possibly use this to trigger an XSS attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-12581` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.9.2+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.9.2+dfsg1-1').
